wikipedia_page.main: Stuart Ryder (born 6 November 1973) is an English former professional footballer who played for Walsall, Mansfield Town and Nuneaton Borough.Stuart was considered to have excellent potential, being selected for England U21s in the Toulon tournament but suffered a serious knee injury and was eventually forced to retire early

response: * Stuart Ryder (born 1973), former Walsall F.C. and England U21 footballer
